name: AI Guys
description:
Overview

You are an advanced sci-fi soldier tasked with eliminating the rouge AI soldiers. You must clear each map in this classic terrorist-hunt style third-person shooter game. Features unique aim recoil mechanics. Players are penalized for "tactical reloads" losing any partial magazines or clips if reload before empty. Ammo conservation is important in the early stages. As you progress through each level, you keep you accumulated guns and ammo. The game rewards you at the completion of each stage by applying bonuses for stealth, speed, and accuracy. Progress is saved after the completion of each level so you can continue a previous game. At the end of the game, there is a retro "high scores" entry with your initials. Currently all high scores are local only and there is no online leaderboard. Features three unique weapons - a pistol, single shot rifle, and a fully automatic assault rifle.

Controls Mouse and Keyboard

Movement: WASD
Look/Aim: Mouse
Jump: Space Bar
Shoot: Left Mouse Button
Crouch: Left Shift (Hold)
Reload: Right Mouse Button
Next Weapon: Mouse Wheel Up
Previous Weapon: Mouse Wheel Down

Gamepad

Movement: Left thumbstick
Look/Aim: Right thumbstick
Jump: "A" / Face Button Down
Shoot: Right Trigger
Crouch: Gamepad Shoulder (Hold), "B" / Face Button Right (Hold)
Reload: "X" / Face Button Left
Next Weapon: "Y" / Face Button Top, D-pad Up
Previous Weapon: D-pad Down

Credits
